pages.text: Tech Reborn is a completely standalone tech mod including tools and machines to gather resources, process materials, and create power. It can be used for only it's power system or more.

pages.title: In-Game Guide
pages.text: Hint: Smelt a couple of $(item)Iron Ingots$() to get the $(item)Refined Iron Ingots$()

pages.title: Interesting Blocks
pages.text: What follows are a few of the most interesting parts of Tech Reborn

pages.title: Solar Panels
pages.text: There are several tiers of solar panels that create more and more energy. If you want to create energy even at night check out $(l:patchouli:advanced_reborn)Advanced Reborn's$(/l) $(item)Permanent Light Generators$()

pages.title: Auto Crafting Table
pages.text: The $(item)Auto Crafting Table$() is a machine that can automate large amounts of crafting. It requires power and ingredients. It can craft only a single recipe. It will automatically balance the input across the recipe slots.

pages.title: Recycler
pages.text: The $(item)Recycler$() is a machine that can convert your junk blocks into $(item)scrap$(). Nine $(item)scrap$() can be crafted into a $(item)scrap box$() which if $(thing)right clicked$() will give you an of 240 random items.

pages.title: Industrial Chunkloader
pages.text: It loads chunks when it is powered!

pages.title: Quantum Armor
pages.text: This endgame armor can take a beating and keep you safe inside. It even provides speed boost, extreme water breathing, and creative flight!
